ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:40:03 [Issue ID 4000-69332] urn:comicvine:4000-69332 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 01:19:10. [Issue ID 88544]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The First American and U.S.Angel star in a docu-soap in "Justice in Tights!" by Alan Moore & Jim Baikie; Splash Brannigan takes on "Testostor the Terrible!" at the Coffeeburg Comicon by Alan Moore & Hilary Barta; Cobweb presented as a series of newspaper strips by Alan Moore & Melinda Gebbie; Greyshirt in "Thinx" by Alan Moore & Rick Veitch. Historical note: For this original presentation Moore had written a Cobweb story which contained statements about L. Ron Hubbard. This was a concern with DC's legal department. In a previous Big Book paradox press story a similar comment was already made without problem. Moore and DC's legal team went over the story, and agreed to changes. After going through the whole process of "censorship" the story was still pulled. To future highlight the how this was not a real issue was that Top Shelf would later publish the pulled story as a different character and a different coloring, but story intact. The story in this issue was a story to replace the censored story.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/tomorrow-stories-8-justice-in-tights-testostor-the/4000-69332/
ComicInfo.Title: Justice in Tights!; Testostor the Terrible!; Brand New Adventure Starts Today!; Thinx
